issue.subject: Unable to save wfs policy
issue.description:
Unable to save wfs policy 
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'JOIN jos_sdi_physicalservice_policy psp ON wsp.id = psp.wfs_spatialpolicy_id WHE' at line 3 SQL=SELECT wsp.*, psp.anyitem FROM jos_sdi_wfs_spatialpolicy wsp INNER JOIN JOIN jos_sdi_physicalservice_policy psp ON wsp.id = psp.wfs_spatialpolicy_id WHERE psp.physicalservice_id = 5 AND psp.policy_id = 4 

                $query->innerJoin('JOIN #__sdi_physicalservice_policy psp ON wsp.id = psp.wfs_spatialpolicy_id');
in administrator\components\com_easysdi_service\views\policy\tmpl\wfs.php
